The legendary series of first-person shooter , which has become one of the most popular gaming lines around the world, ready to break through to the present perfection! The new game Call of Duty: Ghosts will offer you not fight for the sake of patriotism , liberty, or the triumph of democracy . You will enjoy a fierce battle for survival.
Ten years after a global cataclysm former influence one of the leading world powers dissipated like smoke. Destroyed economy , the government is not capable of protecting citizens and military , desperately trying to keep under control the major regions of the country - that's the harsh reality with which to face the elite unit of fighters " Ghost ." Only they are able to challenge the new global force, equipped with the latest technology and applying for world domination. Features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Development of a multiplayer game : With the updated engine Call of Duty: Ghosts will change your ideas about modes of multiplayer games . The dynamically changing maps you encounter earthquakes, floods and other events that could affect the strongest terms the tactics and strategy of battle. And advanced character editor allows players to create a truly unique fighters .
